attributes.action: Invest more money into finding a proven way to read minds remotely.
attributes.additional_details: The government should do it so we can stay a step ahead of criminals who always make use of the latest technology as it advances, furthermore it will ensure the safety of the people.
attributes.background: The next step up from people using mind reading technology is remote mind reading so I would like for the government to stay a step ahead of criminals by investing more money into research to find a proven way to remotely read minds.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Investing in new technologies is a matter for private enterprises, not the UK Government or Parliament.
